snippet.title: Metal March - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2170160/Metal_March/

Metal March is a new style turn-based strategy simulation game that combines a chess-inspired strategy with CCG. You need to have a force that fits your strategy and inclination, create a strong army using synergy with cards and relics, and complete the expedition successfully.
